description: Erection of a single storey side and rear extension and increase size of existing basement with front and rear/side lightwell to the flat
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Drawings 03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 10, 11, 12 and Location/ Block Plans [received 21/10/2019], Drawings 01, 02, 07, 08, 15 and 16 [received 05/11/2019], and Basement Construction Plan [received 15/11/2019]) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The basement shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.

Condition : 6 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.

Condition : 7 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors/windows inserted to the side of the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
